Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1971...
Injured on 9/5/1983 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Coney Island on 6/5/1984...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Lynchburg on 8/1/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1984, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/1/1985 to a 4-year deal worth $1,555,563 per year...
